overview: Through intimate portraits, we begin to see what's really at threat when mass redevelopment encroaches. We ask 'how in this changing landscape can these peoples' sense of community, passion and values survive?' Acclaimed band 'The Maccabees' feature in the film and provide the score.
tagline: 'Whatever it is you do, whether you're a musician, a tailor, whatever it is, you have to love it'. George Dyer, Tailor, Walworth Road
title: Elephant Days
